subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In their final meeting of the regular season, Curt Schilling outlasted Roger Clemens but couldn’t beat Derek Jeter, who drove a splitter over the Green Monster for the winning run.
snippet: In their final meeting of the regular season, Curt Schilling outlasted Roger Clemens but couldn’t beat Derek Jeter, who drove a splitter over the Green Monster for the winning run.
